teamMessages.2-title: A Huge Announcement! Pocketnet application is now called Bastyon!
teamMessages.2-message1: The domain will be moved to Bastyon.com. We released the following major updates recently:

teamMessages.2-message2: Invite your friends now and be a part of the big future of decentralized internet!
